mapper.update: update db_country set COUNTRYNAME = #{countryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTRYNAMEEN = #{countrynameen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where COUNTRYID = #{countryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select COUNTRYID, COUNTRYNAME, COUNTRYNAMEEN, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3 from db_country
